column1:
"  Certainly! As a medical chatbot, I can help you monitor your blood pressure and heart rate, as well as provide guidance on how to manage your caffeine intake.

To start, can you tell me a little bit about your caffeine consumption? How much coffee or other caffeinated beverages do you drink each day? And at what times of the day do you consume them? This information will help me provide more personalized advice." "Mi dispiace
column2: ma come assistente virtuale non sono in grado di memorizzare informazioni personali come i dettagli del consumo di caffeina. Ti consiglio di tenere un diario personale o utilizzare un'app specializzata per monitorare il tuo consumo."
